Brawler.desc: Brawlers are monstrous fighters in battle that deal a lot damage.
Brawler.Knight: Upon takedown, Knight fully heals and replenishes their set of soups.
Brawler.Alpha: Alpha becomes a lot more fierceful with the pack.
Brawler.Viking: Viking is a relentless force driven by rage, feared amongst everyone.
Brawler.Basilisk: Basilisk strives in long term battles poisoning opponents.
Brawler.Warrior: For every takedown Warrior is granted great buffs.
Brawler.Slayer: Slayer is unmatched in raw brutal strength.
Brawler.Challenger: Challenger may weaken a soul until either one is vanquished.
Brawler.Shaman: Shaman channels the spirit realm to enter spirit mode.
Brawler.Vampire: Vampire sustains by draining the lifeforce of their opponents.

Duelist.desc: Specialises in aggressive playstyles to outplay an opponent.
Duelist.Fisherman: Fisherman may teleport hooked enemies to them or may leap forward on marked location.
Duelist.Bomber: Bomber causes devastating area damage with explosive attacks.
Duelist.Ninja: Ninja is able to quickly position themselves behind their closest target in the blink of an eye.
Duelist.Monkey: Monkey is a trickster whom has mastered the art of confusion.
Duelist.Hyper: Hyper is insanely agile on their feet.
Duelist.Rogue: A master of stealth may go completely invisible.
Duelist.Phoenix: Phoenix is free to dash in any direction.
Duelist.Pirate: Pirate excels at plundering, earning gold and golden apples for each takedown.

Ranged.desc: Damage opponents from afar whilst keeping your distance.
Ranged.Inferno: Inferno shoots flaming arrows that sets opponents ablaze on arrow hit.
Ranged.Scout: Scout is extremely dangerous due to withering arrows which denies healing.
Ranged.Artillery: Artillery has impeccable damage but has to be careful.
Ranged.Snowman: Snowman slows opponents and are quick on their feet.

Tank.Star: Stars are forged with immense density emitting powerful darkness.
Tank.Dragon: Dragon blasts targets aflame in an area.
Tank.Hedgehog: Hedgehogs are extremely resiliant and shrugs damage off with ease.
Tank.Juggernaut: Juggernauts are massive, being able to face tank anything.
